textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Nora is gone as well..      As is her stuff this time..

textBox.name: Innkeeper
textBox.text: H-hey!          Where do you think you’re going?

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: (All this noise..       So much fire..          People running..)

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: (...Hideout.    Camp.      Close enough to scout, reasonable enough to withstand the environment.)

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: (The map from the book..     There was a river to the east..    As well as a clearing..)

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: (And nobody is fleeing east..   That must be it..)

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: (A chaotic attack..     But organized..?   Too big to hide.)

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: (In any case it’s to the east.)
Now now..         Did you get lost, kid?

textBox.name: Bandit
textBox.text: Hey!      Where do you think-   AH-!

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Sorry, I'm in a hurry.     Would you please mind not interrupting...

textBox.name: Bandit
textBox.text: My..     my arm..       MY FUCKING ARM!

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: O-oh..    uh wait..     Here you can use-

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: There..     A door..   Behind some rocks..

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: How do I approach this correctly...

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: ..Maybe she is hurt..             I have to help...

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: It not only marks where we are,     but also...     our new distination!

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: And we actually aren't even that far from the Valley!

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: That is lovely but..      What about-

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Like I said,     don't worry about em..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: They are fine.      Just some loud bandits.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Knocked some sense into them or whatever.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: (...They are breathing..         A faint smell of blood..         Not that much though..)

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Were you that worried that I...

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: I just wanted to make sure they are fine..

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: I thought..       I thought I finally understood you a bit more yesterday..

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: But I don’t at all.       What..        Who even are you?

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: ..Was the first time I felt like you were actually talking to me.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: I’m sorry..       I’m just so confused..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: They took the entire pile of sweets..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Stop looking at me like that...

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Well I hate it.     It can go again.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Anyway,         we got a map so let's go.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: I’m not gonna gloss over the fact that you single handedly knocked out an entire bandit camp though..

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: ...and just for some sweets at that..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: I’m not some comicaly brutal lunatic,   ok...

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: At least see it as a heroic act to save the village or something.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Now,     let’s get going.        Don’t want to stay here for too long..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: You weren’t actually like..         That scared of me that you flinched like that right?

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: A-ah..      No,       that wasn’t because of you..

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: ...On my way here there was a bandit that tried to stop me..

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: And he wanted to grab me so I pulled his arm away..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Oh.     Uhm..     Kinda glad you flinched then.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: I’m worried..      Hope he is alright..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: ..Least we know that you aren’t technically unarmed now.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: This is nothing to joke about!

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Hey,         you wanted more of the “me” from yesterday,    so...

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Your apparent unbridled strength is not that abnormal from your other quirks.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: I’ll help you work on that, so it won’t happen again.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Besides,         he definitely isn’t capable of hurting others for a while.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: So in a way you protected some people.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Uhm..     Also!,      this shows that you are feeling better again!

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: I’m not good at comforting people, ok.       Cut me some slack.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: I’ll help you work on that.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: I can only handle so much awkward tension.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: You are almost as bad as her..

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: You mentioned “her” a couple of times now...         Who is she?

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Do you..     Want to talk about it?

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: I had enough stress for today..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: I feel way too tired already..

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: We can set up camp somewhere soon if you want.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: You are quite good at sneaking up on people...

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: ..Well you did gather all the wood and stuff....    So,      let me help you with this one.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: I read about some magic in the library.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Uhm..          Something along those lines I guess..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: I…             It was created,     so it needs a name.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: The original name was; AMD V-3.7C or ”Amplified Mineral Discharge Version 3.7-Chamberd”.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: I see why it was named..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Heh..      It’s a left handed prototype..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: It was designed as a utility tool to help in various ways.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Practical.       What else can it do?

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Wouldn’t it be more helpful for me to know what-

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: You will simply have to wait~

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: See you in a bit..         Just need a little nap..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: You..      are gonna keep guard until I wake up,     right?

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Quite a while.          It’s almost evening.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Mff..      Why didn’t you wake me up?

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: You looked like you needed the rest.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: You..      looked like you needed it..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Haven’t slept this well in a while..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: You..      didn’t stare at me the entire time right..?

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: No.     I was keeping guard, remember?

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: You did sleep talk a bit though..

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: You just mentioned the moon a few times..

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Is there something more to the moon then I know?

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Sometimes ”things” can also be names,      you know..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Pack the boiled water and pour some over the pit.          We can leave the rest.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: I’ll explain it on the go~

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Like..      a personal trick or ability.       Least thats what they called it.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Wait.        Is that how you got onto the roof?

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Still surprised you climbed that honestly.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: What can I say?       Didn’t think you would actually try to get up there.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Well,      you mentioned you were on the roof.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: I say a lot of things.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: …As long as It never leaves your possession.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Well..     we are approaching something on the map..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Wait,      I hear something rattling as well..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Also it’s kinda funny you got more startled by a cat then a-

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Well..       no,        though that would have been funny.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Since when do you have a weapon?

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Listen,        I’m as confused as you are.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Wait..       let me look at it for a second.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: You clearly seem more aware of something then me.       What is happening?

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: It reminds me of something similar your coat did when I patched you up back then..

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: I would rather not have my coat vanish into thin air as well….

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Anyway,    when I found you,          you were clutching this bandage in your hand.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: So while patching you up I just..       Wrapped it around your wrist.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: …I was wondering why you were just holding it.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: I don’t even know what I did in the first place.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: I heard something.     Thought there was danger.      Next thing I know I was holding it.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: (Was it instinct?      When did I even do it?)

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Maybe you are thinking too hard about it.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Don’t worry though.      I’m sure it will come to you later.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: I’d rather not have it “Come to me” while it’s wrapped around my arm..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: It will be fineee.      Besides,     it looks like you {bold}do{/bold} have a weapon!

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: A really hidden one at that.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: ...Also,       we should get going again if we want to make it by tomorrow.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: You don’t look too happy about that revelation.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: I’m not sure what to feel…

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: I have been wondering, who or..    {italic}What{/italic},        I have been.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: It was..      Almost a relief to know I was unarmed..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Still thinking about that arm thing..?

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: I..      didn’t hurt anyone before..      Right?

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Just because you are armed does not mean you hurt others.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Could simply be a tool.    Or a deterrent.    Or for self defense.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Or all of the above.     I mean, look at me.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Ok     {italic}maaaaybe{/italic},     I’m not the best example,       {bold}BUT{/bold},      I only knocked them out..        {italic}G e n t l y{/italic}.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: ...Worrying about it won’t get me anywhere I guess..

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Though your words aren’t really making me feel any more at ease..
